nodes.bodyText: Instead of doing Deque<Tuple<Map<String, Integer>, Integer>> you should make this an actuall class with documentation what what is. So create something like StructureBuildSection and make this field a Deque<StructureBuildSection> Patch all your fields and methods accordingly, and do not forget to document.
